task.title: Troubleshooting
task.shortdesc: Use this information to identify problems when installing and running the DITA Open Toolkit.

taskbody.context: Out of Memory Error- In step four of testing DITA installation, you may receive a message stating the build has failed due to an "Out of Memory" error.

step.cmd: In the command prompt under the DITA Open Toolkit directory (DITAOT) type export ANT_OPTS=${ANT_OPTS} -Xmx256M
Repeat step four of the testing DITA installation process again by typing ant all in the console.
